Sentencas: The present research proposes an innovative multi-physics coupled model of different configurations of an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle (IGFC) system employing Solid Oxide Electrolytic Cell (SOEC) for CO2 capture.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: Full-system simulation is carried out to examine efficiency.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: The model incorporates a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC), a SOEC, a gas turbine (GT), and multiple recirculation loops operated by two ejectors.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: The results reveal that compared with traditional power plants, the proposed IGFC system equipped with SOEC can reduce CO2 emission by almost 80%, and operates environmentally beneficial.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: The efficiency of the system varies greatly depending on the design parameters implemented.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: The CO2 enrichment phenomenon by SOFC and capture measures of CO2 by SOEC are simultaneously analyzed.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: In addition, parametric analysis is performed to evaluate the coupling influence of multiple operating parameters on the IGFC system.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: Recirculation ratios of 0.75 with four times recirculations are found to be the optimal conditions for both SOFC fuel electrode and SOEC air electrode aimed at getting to the highest power generation efficiency and total CO2 capture rate of the system.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: After systematic optimization of the design parameters, the electrical efficiency and CO2 capture rate of the proposed system could achieve 68.47% and 87.88%, respectively, which are about 20% and 60% greater than those of traditional power plants.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture

Sentencas: Furthermore, after optimizing the control strategy, the fuel utilization rate of the system increases from 63.09% to 83.40%.
Titulo: Assessment of CO2 enrichment mechanism in integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle system with carbon capture
